name: Chunk of Aerosiderite
description: Weapon Ascension Material.  When Khaenri'ah was destroyed, a great sinner created endless monsters withdark, alien blood flowing through their veins. They rampaged across the land,destroying all in their paths. They were mutated lifeforms, and the mutationswere caused by powers from beyond this world. The black serpentine dragonDurin that attacked Mondstadt was one such mutated being.
